typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Cust_id as string,
		Name as string,
		Age as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ParamDataFlow
ParamDataFlow sink(input(
		cust_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParamDataFlowSink
